And the one who lost a son...Hey its okay, that was his job, he got caught by you and you cut his balls off, gutted him and skin him alive...then threw his body down a out house in a pile of shi*. We found what was left of him about 5 yrs after you did it..but its okay..here want some more tea and crackers... Talk is big until it hits home, just like 9/11, only the families know what that hurt is, not you or you or you, you know the ones who post c crap on this site. The so call big guys..who support finger fighting over real fighting and defending our country. If it takes torture then it takes torture..and you can re-assure the person that the info he gave you is wrong, more is to come...now if he is that tuff and does that. Then all your sweet talking in the world won't make him talk. There is a time and place for torture, its the real messing part of war...

content: Okay all you what evers....How do you feel when one of ours is tortured? How would you feel if you son or daugther was in the service, capture and tortured? If you had the chance would you torture one of them if you capture one? Or would you hand them a peanut butter and jelly sandwich and stroke him on the head and say Everything going to be alright. I holded nothing aginst you and 20 of your friends for raping my daughter then gutting her and hung her body upside down on some bridge headless.... And the one who lost a son...Hey its okay, that was his job, he got caught by you and you cut his balls off, gutted him and skin him alive...then threw his body down a out house in a pile of shi*. We found what was left of him about 5 yrs after you did it..but its okay..here want some more tea and crackers... Talk is big until it hits home, just like 9/11, only the families know what that hurt is, not you or you or you, you know the ones who post c crap on this site. The so call big guys..who support finger fighting over real fighting and defending our country. If it takes torture then it takes torture..and you can re-assure the person that the info he gave you is wrong, more is to come...now if he is that tuff and does that. Then all your sweet talking in the world won't make him talk. There is a time and place for torture, its the real messing part of war...

That one document and the belief in it's guiding principles seperates us from the rest of the world. You seem to believe "it can't happen here". If we abandon our principles I assure you, it can.
title: New York Judge Orders CIA to release Torture Records

content: Okay all you what evers....How do you feel when one of ours is tortured? How would you feel if you son or daugther was in the service, capture and tortured? If you had the chance would you torture one of them if you capture one? Or would you hand them a peanut butter and jelly sandwich and stroke him on the head and say Everything going to be alright. I holded nothing aginst you and 20 of your friends for raping my daughter then gutting her and hung her body upside down on some bridge headless.... And the one who lost a son...Hey its okay, that was his job, he got caught by you and you cut his balls off, gutted him and skin him alive...then threw his body down a out house in a pile of shi*. We found what was left of him about 5 yrs after you did it..but its okay..here want some more tea and crackers... Talk is big until it hits home, just like 9/11, only the families know what that hurt is, not you or you or you, you know the ones who post c crap on this site. The so call big guys..who support finger fighting over real fighting and defending our country. If it takes torture then it takes torture..and you can re-assure the person that the info he gave you is wrong, more is to come...now if he is that tuff and does that. Then all your sweet talking in the world won't make him talk. There is a time and place for torture, its the real messing part of war...
